content:
During the day, Russian troops inflicted 442 strikes on 9 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisReportedHead of the Zaporizhzhya Regional Military Administration Ivan Fedorov.

Three aviation strikes were carried out by Russian servicemen on a small toct and a robot.

91 UAV attacked Guliaypole, Levadne, robot, small Tokmachka, Malynivka and Novoandriivka.

There were also 9 RSSVs on a small toct and a robot.

339 Artudari was inflicted on the territory of Guliaypol, Orikhov, Novodanylivka, Little Tokmachka, Robotyna, Novoandriivka, Malynivka, Levadny and Vozdvizhivka.

There were 28 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. The civilians were not injured.

As reported by the Armyinform, the night of March 30 Russian troopsFiredThe city of Selidovo, Donetsk region, two C-300 missiles.
title: In the Zaporozhye region, the enemy struck 442 strokes a day
description: This was announced by the head of the Zaporizhzhya Regional Military Administration Ivan Fedorov.    Three airstrikes...
author: Army Inform
